title: Strengthening Instructional Design Practical Competencies: Mobile Learning Application Development and Evaluation: Design-Based

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and fundamental science domain concepts
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can iteratively redesign a mobile learning application three or more times by applying Design-Based Research (DBR) methodology.
Learners can improve an application by incorporating feedback from diverse stakeholders (content experts, developers, etc.).
Learners can analyze the effectiveness of a developed application through project-based assessment using scientific methodologies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
